set-variable.value: #[(if((attributes.queryParams.offset != null) and (attributes.queryParams.offset != "")) attributes.queryParams.offset else 0) as Number]
#[(if((attributes.queryParams.limit != null) and (attributes.queryParams.limit != "")) attributes.queryParams.limit else 10) as Number]
#[(if((attributes.queryParams.idfc != null) and (attributes.queryParams.idfc != "")) attributes.queryParams.idfc else 0) as Number]
